title: RichTextBlock TextHighlighter crashes if used after an InlineUIElement
body: Exactly as the title says. Attempting to use TextHighlighter(s) with a StartIndex after an InlineUIElement will result in a crash. I have included code to reproduce the issue:

This would be beyond the end of the string of text. Please ignore the fact this start index is invalid, the code will crash even with valid indices.
